scripts.build:server: cd server && yarn build && docker-compose build
scripts.start: yarn setup && yarn build && yarn compose:up && yarn server:client
scripts.db:dump: cd server && docker-compose exec -T mongo mongodump --archive --gzip --db product-database > dump.gz
scripts.db:restore: cd server && docker-compose exec -T mongo mongorestore --archive --gzip product-database < dump.gz
